title: Work-Study - AI AND DATA SCIENCE DEVELOPER
description_part1: I am actively seeking a work-study/apprenticeship starting **immediately** (1 week at school / 1 week at the company) to fulfill my third-year bachelor's degree in AI and Data Science at **EPSI Montpellier**.
description_part2: As a graduate in **Aeronautical Engineering**, I am dedicated to developing solid competencies in **data analysis**, intelligent automation, and **model deployment** to contribute to high-impact technological projects.
about_paragraph_1: With a degree in aeronautical engineering, I began my career in aircraft maintenance hangars, where I worked directly on engines, landing gear, and mechanical systems. Those years spent handling tools, following safety procedures, and diagnosing technical problems taught me the rigor, method, and patience that are essential qualities in any technological environment.
about_paragraph_2: It was this same curiosity for precision and performance that led me to turn to computer development and artificial intelligence. Today, as I pursue a bachelor's degree in Artificial Intelligence and Data Science at EPSI Montpellier, I am exploring how data and machine learning can transform the maintenance, design, and efficiency of technical systems.
about_paragraph_3: My ambition is to build a bridge between the physical world of aeronautics and the digital world of AI, using data to improve reliability, fault prediction, and the sustainability of mechanical systems. This transition is not a change of direction, but a natural evolutionâ€”from wrenches to algorithms, always driven by the same engine: the pursuit of precision and innovation.

projects.title: Aircraft Performance and Engine Type Prediction
projects.teaser: Involves data cleaning, feature selection (Lasso, Mutual Info), model training (Linear, Logistic Regression), evaluation (RMSE, R2, Accuracy, F1), and cross-validation. Strong focus on **Machine Learning**.

projects.title: Aircraft Crash Data Analysis
projects.teaser: Project showcases data wrangling, interactive visualization, and clustering skills. Demonstrates **Data Analysis** competencies.
